def_cn: 使(骨头、关节)脱位;使脱臼
def_en: If you dislocate a bone or joint in your body, or in someone else's body, it moves out of its proper position in relation to other bones, usually in an accident.

def_cn: 扰乱(制度、进程、生活方式等);使混乱;使运转不正常
def_en: To dislocate something such as a system, process, or way of life means to disturb it greatly or prevent it from continuing as normal.
